explanation.rules:
Yɛfrɛ me N - 'My name is N'. Yɛfrɛ me R N - 'My R's name is N'. ne ... - 'and ...'. -nom - plural.
Terms for a man's kin:
ɛna - 'mother; mother's sister'. agya - 'father; father's brother'. nua - 'sibling; father's brother's son/daughter; mother's sister's son/daughter'. ba - 'son/daughter; fraternal nephew/niece (brother's son/daughter)'. sewaa - 'father's sister'. sewaaba - 'father's sister's son/daughter'. wɔfa - 'mother's brother'. wɔfaba - 'mother's brother's son/daughter'. wɔfaase - 'sororal nephew/niece (sister's son/daughter)'. yere - 'wife'.
rule_checklist: Yɛfrɛ me N - 'My name is N'.
Yɛfrɛ me R N - 'My R's name is N'.

Terms for a man's kin:ɛna - 'mother; mother's sister'.agya - 'father; father's brother'.nua - 'sibling; father's brother's son/daughter; mother's sister's son/daughter'.ba - 'son/daughter; fraternal nephew/niece (brother's son/daughter)'.sewaa - 'father's sister'.sewaaba - 'father's sister's son/daughter'.wɔfa - 'mother's brother'.wɔfaba - 'mother's brother's son/daughter'.wɔfaase - 'sororal nephew/niece (sister's son/daughter)'.yere - 'wife'.
